content: in next stitch *1sc 6 times 2sc in next stitch* 2 times then do 1sc 5 times with 2sc in last stitch total 30 sts move marker *** to make tail on the left side do this part *** round 17l do *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next st * then make 1 single_crochet in each next 12 stitches next do *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next st * total 26 move marker round 18l do *1sc 6 times 2sc in next stitch* once then *1sc 5 times with 2sc in next stitch* 2 times next do *1sc 6 times 2sc in next stitch* once total 30 sts move marker continue to the bottom… round 19 20 21 make 1sc in each stitch total 30 sts move your marker round 22 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc over next 2 sts decrease * 6 times total 24 move marker round 23 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc over next 2sts decrease * 6 times total 18 move marker round 24 repeat *1sc 1sc over next 2 sts decrease * 6 times total 12 stuff filling for your body do not stuff too firm otherwise the cat wont sit straight take out the marker last round 25 repeat decrease *1sc over next 2stitches* for 6 times slip_stitch then fasten_off fo leave a long tail of yarn once you finish the bottom using your tapestry needle to draw your remaining yarn up to the side of ear and form the shape of two ears then hide the rest of yarn inside the kitty tail… chain 12+1 single_crochet on the last 2nd chain and make 1 single_crochet in every chain all the way back to the first chain and fasten_off then sew to the body hide the remaining yarn use a little bit of white yarn to embroid kitty s nose use a piece of red yarn to tie a bow around the neck
